title: Self-Directed Science Lecture Design Using Non-Traditional Syllabi

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and work experience
context.additional_context: Designing lectures optimized for smartphone-based learning environments targeting working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze course vision statements to derive three core learning directions.
Learners can construct vision-based goal-assessment-activity frameworks for science course design with 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish learning plans using vision statements in mobile environments and implement them at over 90% adherence for four weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
